thread.section_title: Classics Hotel Parc des Expositions - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Issy-les-Moulineaux, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel
thread.title_full: Great hotel - Review of Classics Hotel Parc des Expositions, Issy-les-Moulineaux, France - TripAdvisor

author: Anca_D85
title: Great hotel
text: I stayed at this hotel for only two nights and I wish it was closer to the place I am working because I would definitely have chosen it for my whole business trip. I was impressed with Pierre's attitude, he was so helpful and polite and he gave me all the information I needed. I was really lucky to be welcomed by such a friendly and professional person on my first days in Paris. I also enjoyed the breakfast a lot and the room was very clean and quiet. I highly recommend this hotel.
